price: Nokorε sε obi a ɔbɛnya aboterε na ͻde bͻne afirie no, nokorε sε εno ne dwumadie a edi mmu (a Onyankopͻn pε).
arabic: وَلَمَن صَبَرَ وَغَفَرَ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمِنۡ عَزۡمِ ٱلۡأُمُورِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaman ṣabara waghafara inna dhālika lamin ʿazmi al-umūri
